pov_statements: A recently laid-off individual needs a way to access their 401K funds strategically because they're facing immediate financial pressure but don't want to destroy their retirement savings
An unemployed person needs to continue building wealth even with reduced income because they can't afford to pause their long-term financial goals during a temporary crisis
A financially stressed individual needs emotional support and guidance because they're making panic decisions that could hurt their long-term financial health
how_might_we_questions: How might we help laid-off individuals access 401K funds strategically to minimize penalties and preserve wealth?
How might we enable continued wealth building during unemployment with small, manageable amounts?
How might we provide emotional support and reduce isolation during financial crisis?
How might we integrate financial stability with job search success?
How might we help users transition back to full employment while maintaining financial discipline?

Integration of financial and career guidance
